Download

Requirements

Xadrian is written in Java and you need at least the Java SE 6 Runtime Environment from Sun. The old Java version 1.5 is not sufficient.

Binaries

  • For Windows: xadrian-1.3.3-windows.zip
  • For Linux/Unix: xadrian-1.3.3-unix.tar.bz2
  • For Mac OS X: xadrian-1.3.3-macosx.zip

Sources

  • xadrian-1.3.3-src.zip
  • xadrian-1.3.3-src.tar.bz2

Sources are also available in the source repository.
